Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Biliary Tract Diseases/Gallbladder Diseases/Cholecystitis/Cholecystitis, Acute/Emphysematous Cholecystitis

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Gastrointestinal Disorder/Liver and Biliary Tract Disorder/Biliary Tract Disorder/Gallbladder Disorder/Cholecystitis/Emphysematous Cholecystitis
Record.Description: A variant of acute cholecystitis with inflammation of the GALLBLADDER that is characterized by the pockets of gas in the gallbladder wall. It is due to secondary infection caused by gas-forming organisms, and has a high risk of perforation.
